title: New: TLC – No Scrubs (Davidian Bootleg)
content:
House music has been taken over and swallowed whole by the increasingly annoying sounds of EDM.

But to think that house is down for the count would be a HUGE mistake. I already raved about producer Davidian in a previous post, but the boy just keeps delivering the goods. Davidian’s bootleg of TLC’s famous track No Scrub is a solid example of this producers growth and signature sounds. It’s a fresher and new perspective on house. Someone get this kid a residency…preferably in New York City.

Hey also free download. MMMMMM free….
